tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
At the very first visit of my pregnancy check i became more comfortable.
Dr.Bhanu ma‚Äôm was so kind and with patience she clarified all our queries.
I was still going to the work until 7th month and she was kind with the flexible appointments and so much supportive over the months.
Regular follow up schedules, insisted us to get scannings and tests done at right time.
During this time she did advice me in all the worries  i come across and even she supported after clinic hours and i still i reconcile she asked us to visit for check up at the very early morning when i had a worry and which was bothered me.
My labor-delivery was well scheduled with the consent from Dr.Bhanu ma‚Äôm and i had normal delivery which was indeed by Dr.Bhanu ma‚Äôm. 
Post delivery ma‚Äôm followed up with me many times and visited multiple times to check wellbeing of baby and me.
All i got from consulting ma‚Äôm is.......
Positive feel during pregnancy 
Proper diet plan 
Became more comfortable and confidence with regular tests
Normal delivery. 
Thanks a ton ma‚Äôm...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited Shishira maternity clinic throughout my pregnancy for the consultation,After many consultation at the end  now I am here writing this review, 1. Dr Bhanu is very Friendly, follows very good professional ethics, cares for the patient, 2. Does not unnecessarily prescribe medicines,  and treatments , will suggest natural methods to concieve rather than costly treatments, if naturally we fail to concieve only then she would prescribe for the injections n medicationsshe would not also prescribe for unnecessary scans3. If patients do not turn up for the follow up, she cares to check on them if they are alright n doing good.4. initially one month clinic was closed due to Covid, but Dr was very propmt in replying or responding back to whatsapp messages and with the required prescriptions5. My BMI was on higher side as I was obese, with her guidance I could keep my weight gain to minimum throughout my pregnancy, 6. I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes during my pregnancy as early as 24th week, The care n the guidance what Dr Bhanu has given me none of the endocrinologist would have given me, I was monitored for my sugar levels every alternate days and in my follow up she used to check regularly n even if I miss any one day reading I used to get scared on how will I face her,because of her guidance towards end of my pregnancy my sugar levels came to normal values and my hba1c reduced from 6.1 to 5.6.At all stages,  my sugar levels, bp all parameters  including fetus growth were in normal and expected range.I would be thankful to her for all the guidance, care, and support what she has given me throughout my Pregnancy.Thank you so much Dr Bhanu üôè

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I have visited Shishira maternity clinic throughout my pregnancy for the consultation, After 9months of consultation I am here writing this review.
1. Dr Bhanu is friendly with good professional ethics, cares for the patient.
 2. Does not unnecessarily prescribe medicines, tests and scans.
3. Every consultation was smooth and there was not much waiting at the clinic, timing was very convenient for me.
4. Dr was always available on calls to respond for any query.
5. Til the last month of my pregnancy I followed her instructions and it was very helpful. 
Overall happy with the guidance and support provided.

*** ** *** **** ************* *** *** *** ******** ** listen to your entire problems without intervening. She makes a note of all the points and genuinely gives all the possible options/advises. I urge everyone to have full faith on the doctor and heed all her advices without thinking twice about it.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: First of all I would like to say thank you to Dr.Bhanu for facilitating my childbirth process. Finding the right gynaecologist is difficult during these times. Dr.Bhanu examines thoroughly and hears out the complaints to give necessary advice. She was available all the time during my last weeks of pregnancy and also visited multiple times to hospital after the delivery. She was calm even though I was very anxious throughout the process. Once again thank you doctor for your support.

review: Doctor Bhanu BT has the highest level of patience. We consulted her from the first trimester to baby's delivery. Dr.Bhanu is very knowledgeable. She prescribed the best medicines. She asked us not to go for unnecessary scans. She is the perfect Doctor for pregnants to visit. We are blessed with a healthy baby and mother is doing fine too. Thanks a ton Doctor for all your help, guidance and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
For my second pregnancy i was looking for a Dr near by my mom's place so was searching on Practo and am glad that i found Dr Bhanu üòä
From the first day of appointment only she was very supportive and very helpful in answering all my doubts regarding pregnancy and related queries.
Every consultation was smooth and there was not much waiting at the clinic. Timing was very convenient and even the receptionist was helpful. 
During my labour also she was just by my side and gave me positive vibes that I can do it. At some point I gave up saying I was tired but she was very supportive and finally I was able to deliver normally. All thanks to Dr Bhanu. If she was not there I wouldn't have done it. She is the epitome of patience and that is really appreciable. Am really glad that I found Dr Bhanu and I strongly recommend her  to anyone without any doubts.
Thank you Dr for all your support and care.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words üôèüèª

review:
I have consulted the doctor for my second pregnancy.

I got high blood pressure in my third semester of pregency and i was so much worried on that but Doctor treated it so well, in such a way that baby should not get affected from that.
She will not prescribe unwanted tests or scans.
 Thought my pregnancy journey, She listened my each and every concerns very calmly and treated me so well. She helped me to delivery the baby normally.

I am very happy with my journey under Dr.Bhanu gudience.
